name: Danone
goal:
Dedicated to bringing health through food to as many people as possible, Danone is a leading global food company built on four business lines: Essential Dairy and Plant-Based, Early Life Nutrition, Waters and Medical Nutrition. Through its “One Planet.One Health” mission and dual commitment to business success and social progress, the company aims to build a healthier future, thanks to better health, better lives and a better world, for all its stakeholders—its 100,000 employees, consumers, customers, suppliers, shareholders and all the communities with which it engages.
Present in over 130 markets, Danone generated sales of approximately €24.7 billion in 2017. Danone’s brand portfolio includes both international brands (Activia, Actimel, Danette, Danonino, Danio, evian, Volvic, Nutrilon/Aptamil, Nutricia) and local brands (Oikos, Prostokvashino, Aqua, Bonafont, Mizone, Blédina, Cow & Gate, Les 2 Vaches). Thanks to the acquisition of WhiteWave (with brands including Alpro, Provamel and Silk) 2016, Danone is now present in the organics and plant-based alternatives to dairy sectors.
Listed on Euronext Paris and on the OTCQX market via an ADR (American Depositary Receipt) program, Danone is a component stock of leading social responsibility indexes including the Dow Jones Sustainability Indexes, Vigeo, the Ethibel Sustainability Index, MSCI Global Sustainability, MSCI Global SRI Indexes and the FTSE4Good Index.
Danone attaches itself to respecting its Advocacy Policy on Lobbying, which is available for download on danone.com
